quotes.quote: Science is a way of thinking much more than it is a body of knowledge.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: All science is either physics or stamp collecting.
quotes.author: Ernest Rutherford

quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: We are all connected; To each other, biologically. To the earth, chemically. To the rest of the universe atomically.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Science knows no country, because knowledge belongs to humanity, and is the torch which illuminates the world.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds new discoveries, is not 'Eureka!' but 'That's funny...'
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: To every action there is always opposed an equal reaction.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton
